import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' const ShippingScreen = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const shippingAddress = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress(address )) navigate('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
